title: Sebastian Köber
text:
Sebastian Köber (born 28 May 1979 in <a href="Frankfurt%20%28Oder%29">Frankfurt (Oder)</a>, <a href="Brandenburg">Brandenburg</a>) is a <a href="Germans">German</a> <a href="boxing">boxer</a>, who won the <a href="Olympic%20medalists%20in%20boxing">Heavyweight bronze medal</a> at the <a href="2000%20Summer%20Olympics">2000 Summer Olympics</a> in <a href="Sydney%2C%20Australia">Sydney, Australia</a>. Three years later, at the <a href="2003%20World%20Amateur%20Boxing%20Championships">2003 World Amateur Boxing Championships</a> in <a href="Bangkok">Bangkok</a>, he once again finished in third place.
Pro.
Köber turned pro in 2006, and won his first nineteen fights against unknowns before losing two decisions to extremely limited opponents, one with a losing record.
